attribute.description: This attribute defines the time in minutes which must elapse after trying n-times to login with the wrong password, before the user has again the possibility to try to login. To deactivate this mechanism set the value to 0.
This attribute defines the maximum number of tries to login with the wrong Password into eFaps, before the User is going to be deactivated. To deactivate this mechanism set the value to 0.
This attribute defines the minimum length of a password in eFaps.
Properties for the PasswordStore Digester Configuration.
(Integer) The Threshold of how many passwords will be stored to compare it with a new given password.

This attribute defines the timezone the database server is running in. This is necessary to use the current timezone functionalities from the database server. If the value is not set. The timezone UTC will be used.
Boolean (true/false): This Attribute defines if in case of compiling JavaScript the warnings related to the JavaScript should be presented or not.
Boolean (true/false): If set to true the javascript stored in the eFaps Database will not be compressed on compile.

This Attribute defines the Menu which is added as a DefaultMenu to all Menubars. To deactivate this feature set the value to "none". The DefaultMenu can also be deactivated individually in every Command or Menu by setting the Property "TargetDefaultMenu" to "none".
Boolean (true/false): activate the automatic search for messages.
Integer: Interval in minutes for the system message trigger.
Integer: Size of the Cache for Persons can grow in the Context.
The path to the libaries the webapp is build on. Needed for compilation of java and Jasperreports. e.g. "/tmp/Jetty_0_0_0_0_8060_efaps.war__efaps__.bo28gn/webapp/WEB-INF/lib/"
